amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 118-656 to amend the definition of "Chinese entities of concern" in section 2 to include "aides, abets, or enables the detention, imprisonment, persecution, or forced labor of Uyghur Muslims.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stauber amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
